result.execSummary:
The defendant Stephanie J Griffith was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Stephanie J Griffith

defendant.name: Griffith, Stephanie J
defendant.address: 2801 East Elizabeth Avenue, St Francis, WI 53235

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Stephanie J Griffith in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Porchia Sharese Lewand appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Sentencing Proceeded. 

AS TO COUNT 1
Court ordered defendant to provide a DNA sample. 

Court ordered defendant to pay a $50.00 fine PLUS all mandatory court costs, fees, and surcharges (including DNA and DV surcharge), in the alternate serve 7 days in the House of Correction, with credit for 7 days time served. 

Received and Filed, Two Certificates of Completion.
Received and Filed, Justice Point Report.
Received and Filed, Justice Point VIOLATION Report; Missed Telephone Contact.
Status conference at 01-20-2016 08:30 am

Attorney Michael Jude in court.  Jaclyn Schwartz appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Case originally set for 12/28/2015. Due to court not being in session, case rescheduled. Defense unable to present defendant on short notice, defense requests case adjourned. Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until the next court date. Court grants defense request for adjournment. Case adjourned to branch 24.  Status conference scheduled for January 20, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Due to court being down, case adjourned. Parties notified.

Defendant Stephanie J Griffith in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Benjamin Calvin Verhulst appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  Additional statements by: Bryan G.   Court found the state has satisfied victims' rights law. Court withheld sentence with the following conditions:
-The defendant must continue all current treatment.
-Maintain absolute sobriety.
-Complete a parenting class and show proof of completion to the court on the next date.
-Complete an anger management course and show proof of completion to the court on the next date.
Court advised the defendant that if all conditions are met by the next date the court will impose a fine only.  Status conference scheduled for December 28, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Sentencing hearing scheduled for 08-28-2015 at 01:30 pm.
Victim statement and JusticePoint meeting verification record - filed by defense counsel

Defendant Stephanie J Griffith in court with Attorney Michael Jude.  Benjamin Calvin Verhulst appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Court found the Defendant guilty and enters judgment of conviction into the record forthwith. 
Statements to the Court regarding victim's difficulty appearing in court due to his employment/work schedule.  Court orders case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 40.
Clerk:  jms

JusticePoint Pretrial Report dated August 5, 2015 received and filed.
Clerk:  jms
Court modified the no contact order to a no violent contact order.

Defendant Stephanie J Griffith in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Sarra Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
Case set for final pretrial conference.  Defense informed the Court the case is going to resolve.  At request of the state, Court vacated the 8/10/15 jury trial date.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.  Plea hearing scheduled for August 6, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
to Adjourn received and filed.  ENTRY MADE WITHOUT COURT FILE.   rmm
Court ordered the children removed from the no contact order.

Defendant Stephanie J Griffith in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Sarra Mae Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Pretrial Conference held.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.  Court advised defendant that the no contact order remains in effect.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 16, 2015 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for August 10, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.  rmm

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.
Court ordered defendant to be monitored by Drug Testing
Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.
Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  
Defendant to have no contact with: Bryan G or his children.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Stephanie J Griffith in court with attorney Bernard S. Stein.  Defendant Stephanie J Griffith in custody.  
Zachary A Wittchow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dallet, Branch 40.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  
Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  
Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 1, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
